title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Matt Barnes on Steph + Klay, Cooper Kupp on Stafford No-Look, Trading Russ w/ Jason Timpf
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Matt Barnes on Steph + Klay, Cooper Kupp on Stafford No-Look, Trading Russ w/ Jason Timpf
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, 14-year NBA veteran - and co-host of the All the Smoke Podcast - Matt Barnes (3:00) reacts to the Warriors heading to another Finals after taking out the Mavericks, Steph’s influence, Klay Thompson’s comeback after 2-years off, what Luka needs in a 2, and why Andrew Wiggins is thriving in the Bay.

Then, Rams Super Bowl MVP Wide Receiver - and Eastern Washington alum - Cooper Kupp (21:00) opens up about his mindset when he arrived at Eastern as a zero star recruit, when he believed he could be a pro, what he saw at his first NFL practice, what it’s like playing for Sean McVay, what immediately wowed him about Matt Stafford, what happened on the famous Stafford no-look pass in the Super Bowl, and what impressed him with OBJ.

Finally, Hoops Tonight  and Lakers Tonight Podcast host Jason Timpf (37:00) breaks down what makes the Warriors so difficult to defend, why they’ve had success defending Luka, if the Warriors dynasty gets enough credit and if the Lakers can find anyone to take Russell Westbrook off their hands.

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
